name: Fast Car 3D Simulator
description:
Fast Car 3D Simulator is the amazing realistic 3D drift racing simulation for players with super efficient game controls and fun to play.

Fasten your seat Belt RACERS !! Are you ready to try the super high speed cars for drifting on the super speedy tracks designed for drift racing with the realistic Physics! Cmon show your RACING fever skills..

KEY FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Different new cars to choose from: sport cars, roadsters, muscle cars!
- Detailed environment
- Rich types of NPC racers
